subject: Team lunch on Friday
body: Anyone up for team lunch on Friday? Thinking we go to the usual place downtown. Let me know if you want to join!

subject: Happy birthday Anna
body: Happy birthday to Anna from accounting! Cake in the break room at 3 PM. Everyone is welcome!

subject: Free coffee in the break room

subject: Elevator maintenance this weekend
body: Please note that the office building elevator will be under maintenance this weekend. Use the stairs on Saturday and Sunday.

subject: Clean out the shared fridge
body: Friendly reminder to clean out the shared fridge by Friday. Anything left will be thrown away.
